document_data.name: Marthin Avathnar
document_data.Activities: Marthin ruled the remote and secret prison stronghold of [[Castle Irlingstar]] in the [[Thunder Peaks]] on the eastern border of [[Cormyr]], where the king put traitor nobles, murderers, and agents of [[Sembia]] and [[Westgate]].
document_data.History: Around [[1480 DR]], he was in his room when suddenly a mysterious individual killed him.
document_data.Personality: Marthin was a pompous but diligent individual.
